title: St. Rose of Lima Novena
description: St Rose of Lima was a Third Order Dominican renowned for her piety and chastity. Pray this novena for chastity, against vanity, for embroiderers, sewing lace, gardeners and florists, Latin America, people ridiculed or misunderstood for their piety, for the resolution of family quarrels, indigenous peoples of the Americas, Peru, Philippines, India, Santa Rosa California, Trinidad and Tobago, and Lima.

days.prayer:
üì± 

@media (max-width: 768px) { #branch-daily-prayer-9 .notice--info { padding: 16px 14px !important; } #branch-daily-prayer-9 a > div:last-child { padding: 16px 20px !important; font-size: 1.1em !important; } }

In the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Spirit. Amen.

Admirable Saint Rose, you were truly a sweet flower blooming on a rugged soil. You were indeed a rose among thorns, bearing, with meekness and patience, the stings of envious tongues, while preserving perfect purity and modesty amid the alluring blandishments of a deceitful world. To the sufferings inflicted on you by others, St Rose of Lima, you added the voluntary tortures of fasting and watching, of a crown of thorns and of a hair shirt, to subdue the flesh and to make yourself like your heavenly Spouse. By the merits you gained with your Divine Bridegroom, obtain for me the grace to bear my afflictions with patience, to remain pure and modest, to be meek and humble, to be faithful to the inspirations of the Holy Spirit, and so to mortify my passions that I may be ever more pleasing and acceptable in the sight of my dear Lord and Savior, Jesus Christ, Who lives and reigns world without end. (mention request here‚Ä¶) Amen. St Rose of Lima, Pray for Us.

Our Father Hail Mary Glory Be

In the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Spirit. Amen.
